text: Michael Curtis Waltrip (born April 30, 1963 in Owensboro, Kentucky) is an American race car driver and owner of his team called Michael Waltrip Racing. Michael Waltrip is the younger brother of three time Sprint cup champion, Darrell Waltrip. Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Daytona 500 winners Category:Sportspeople from Kentucky Category:American racecar drivers Category:People from Owensboro, Kentucky
title: Michael Waltrip
